CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , three low band gap D-A copolymers , based on the DTP donor and the BT acceptor , with different numbers of thienyl spacers along the backbone have been designed and synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTP donor copolymers |
| BT acceptor copolymers |
| DTP-thienyl-DTP copolymers (with thienyl spacers along the backbone) |
| DTP-thienyl-BT copolymers (with thienyl spacers along the backbone) |
| DTP-BT copolymers (with no thienyl spacers along the backbone) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTP-thienyl-DTP copolymers (with thienyl spacers along the backbone) |
| DTP-thienyl-BT copolymers (with thienyl spacers along the backbone) |
| DTP-BT copolymers (with no thienyl spacers along the backbone) |

The paragraph mentions "three low band gap D-A copolymers" but it does not provide enough context to determine what "D-A" stands for in this context. Therefore, it is not included in the table as a material name.
